name: Camtasia Shortcut Set (Windows only)
summary: A CAMSHORTCUTS file stores a set of keyboard shortcuts used by the Windows version of TechSmith Camtasia, a screen recording and editing application. It contains keyboard shortcuts and their associated actions in plain text. Camtasia users type shortcuts stored in a CAMSHORTCUTS file to perform various actions, such as exporting a project to a local file or jumping to the beginning of the timeline.
